meanings.sent1: The dedicator placed a plaque on the bench in memory of his friend.
meanings.sent2: The museum dedicator carefully arranged the artifacts in the exhibit.
meanings.sent3: The dedicator jokingly dedicated a parking spot to his favorite sandwich.
meanings.sent4: She was a true dedicator of time, always volunteering for community events.
meanings.sent5: The dedicator's commitment to the cause was unwavering and inspiring.

meanings.definition: To dedicate or devote to a particular purpose or cause.
meanings.sent1: She decided to dedicator her free time to helping shelter animals.
meanings.sent2: The team will dedicator this victory to their coach who passed away.
meanings.sent3: He tried to dedicator his morning coffee to productivity, but ended up scrolling through social media.
meanings.sent4: The artist dedicator her latest painting to the beauty of nature.
meanings.sent5: The students decided to dedicator their project to raising awareness about climate change.
